title: Unique & Unusual Armour
description: Immerse your audience in an unparalleled gaming experience with our collection of over 220 high-detail armour icons.
longDescription:
Immerse your audience in an unparalleled gaming experience with our collection of over 220 high-detail armour icons. This meticulously curated set is divided into three distinct categories â€“ Cuirass, Footwear, and Helmets. Each icon is a testament to superb design, manifesting the utmost quality with its stunning 1024px by 1024px high resolution.


Crafted with the precision and devotion of a blacksmith, our cuirass icons depict a range of protective torso gear from across ages and civilizations. Whether it's the classic Roman lorica segmentate or a futuristic energy shield, these icons cater to every narrative and game world imaginable.


The footwear folder is a testament to the diversity of combat boots and armoured shoes. From leather sandals of ancient warriors to the robust boots of medieval knights and space-age exoskeleton feet, they'll carry your characters through any terrain and timeline your game inhabits.


Our helmets category is where historical authenticity meets futuristic vision. Conventional iron helms, Viking headgear, sci-fi helmets with advanced HUD - whatever be your game's setting, this folder has you covered.


Our icons are designed to integrate seamlessly into any game environment, catering to a multitude of gaming genres from fantasy and historical to science fiction. They are an ideal fit for game developers seeking to enrich their games' visual narrative, add depth to character customization, or enhance their inventory systems.


Boost your game's visual storytelling today with our high-detail armour icons collection, where every pixel narrates an epic tale of battle and bravery.


Technical Information:


226 Individual PNG's with transparent backgrounds

88 Cuirasses Icons

66 Helmet Icons

72 Footwear Icons
